Package org.lwjgl.bgfx

Class BGFXVertexDecl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.bgfx.BGFXVertexDecl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
    public class BGFXVertexDecl
extends Struct
implements NativeResource
    Vertex declaration.

    Member documentation

    • stride – vertex stride
    • offset – relative attribute offset from the vertex

    Layout

    
 struct bgfx_vertex_decl_t {
     uint32_t hash;
     uint16_t stride;
     uint16_t offset[BGFX_ATTRIB_COUNT];
     uint16_t attributes[BGFX_ATTRIB_COUNT];
 }

    • Constructor Detail

      • BGFXVertexDecl

        public BGFXVertexDecl​(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a BGFXVertexDecl instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
